mapper.insert: INSERT INTO temporary_accounts ( "account" , "temporary_account" , "timestamp" ) VALUES ( #{account} , #{temporary_account} , now() ) ON CONFLICT ("sequence") DO UPDATE SET "account" = EXCLUDED."account", "temporary_account" = EXCLUDED."temporary_account", "timestamp" = EXCLUDED."timestamp";
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM temporary_accounts WHERE LOWER("temporary_account") = LOWER(#{temporary_account}) AND (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (now() - "timestamp")) < 60);
DELETE FROM temporary_accounts WHERE EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (now() - "timestamp")) > 300;
